programme.title: Treasure Hunting Of The Dragon In Shanghai Beach
The Strange Snake Story In Shangtong Village
May We Chat
programme.desc: Dealing with the controversial issues of youth and sex, this film captures how three young women struggle to find a balance between reality and their ideals.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: This action crime drama stars Donnie Yen & Andy Lau as a drug kingpin and a corrupt policeman who team up to build an underworld empire in 1960s Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: The owner of a small cleaning company, Chak, experiences a tough time during the pandemic. When he employs single mother Candy as his assistant, she became his saving grace.

programme.title: LEIO
programme.desc: An ex-singer returns to his hometown & takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken town, only to discover a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground!

programme.title: Dummy Mommy Without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen fakes a pregnancy to keep her job when she finds out that she is about to be fired. She begins to feel guilty about her lie when she receives much care from her colleagues.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a case where the body was undiscovered for 8 years. During the investigation, the prosecutor finds all inconsistencies & suspicions fall on Choi.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb threats is causing fear in Hong Kong. An ex-bomb disposal officer becomes prime suspect after a terrorist attack & becomes a fugitive to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the establishment of the People's Republic of China, blind piano tuner He Bing is recruited for his exceptional hearing with the mission to find the transmission signals of the rebel forces.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families.

programme.title: Marriage with a Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and Sean, who have been together for seven years, betray each other three days before their wedding. Faced with 'perfect' partners, they abandon their responsibilities and part ways.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: In Zhang Yimou's screen gem that captures the power of cinema, a labour camp escapee seeks a newsreel that captures a one-second glimpse of his daughter. However, he has competition.

programme.title: Ready o/r Rot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi face pre-marital strife. Meanwhile, Grey Bear doubts his wife's fidelity and Ken faces a life crisis following his girlfriend's pregnancy. Can they resolve their relationship issues?

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family's expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan resents their fraudulent ways. However, when fate shows him a route to redeeming their reputation, will he survive it?

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Based on Hong Kong's biggest financial scandal of Ching Yat Yin, who rises from rags to become a billionaire. An ICAC investigator spends 15 years to uncover the truth behind his rapid rise in wealth.

programme.title: Go For Broke
programme.desc: With his family destroyed by drug dealers, Zhang Yao teams up with detective An to take down the drug lords. As the revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: A Hong Kong drama written & directed by Kearen Pang, former talent manager Mei Fung retired to take care of her husband & son, but decides to return to work to find her value in life.

programme.title: Caught In Time
programme.desc: Based on a string of real robberies and murder cases, a detective engages in a mouse-and-cat game with the 'Eagle Gang', a group of sophisticated, well-trained and ruthless robbers.

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behavior and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. When he meets his teenage nephew who is ashamed of his stutter, the two develop a special friendship through mutual understanding.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng, Vic Chow, Raymond Lam & Wu Chun, star in this tale that depicts how the seven sons of General Yang set out to rescue their father from an army of thousands.

programme.title: I Fine..Thank You..Love You
programme.desc: In this high grossing Thai romcom starring Sunny who portrays Yim. In order to win back his Japanese girlfriend, Yim hires a charming tutor to improve his English but falls for her instead.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A remake from the Japanese movie Key of Life, Andy Lau, Xiao Yang and Wan Qian stars in this action comedy about the switched identities of an unsuccessful actor & a professional assassin.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
